CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: First , film morphology was Figure 6 shows the PL spectra of the polymers and polymer : PC 70 BM blend films spin - coated from CB solutions or CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PC (Polycarbonate) |
| BM (Blend of polymers) |
| CB (Carbon Black) |
| DIO (Di-2-Ethylhexyl Sebacate) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PC (Polycarbonate) |
| BM (Blend of polymers) |
| CB (Carbon Black) |
| DIO (Di-2-Ethylhexyl Sebacate) |

Note: In this context, "blend of polymers" can be considered a material that is a combination of two or more polymers.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: First , film morphology was Figure 6 shows the PL spectra of the polymers and polymer : PC 70 BM blend films spin - coated from CB solutions or CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| film morphology |
| PL spectra |
| polymers |
| PC |
| BM blend films |
| spin-coated |
| from CB solutions |
| CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| film morphology |
| PL spectra |
| PC |
| BM blend films |
| spin-coated from CB solutions |
| CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives |

Note: "PL spectra" refers to Photoluminescence spectra, which is a material property that describes the emission of light from a material when excited by light. Therefore, it is included in the table. "First" and "Figure 6 shows" are not material properties and have been removed.
